snippet: The mass murderer Charles Manson has gotten a license to marry a 26-year-old woman who visits him at Corcoran State Prison where he is serving a life sentence.
abstract: Mass murderer Charles Manson gets license to marry Afton Elaine Burton, 26-year-old woman who visits him at California's Corcoran State Prison, where he is serving a life sentence.
lead_paragraph: The mass murderer Charles Manson has gotten a license to marry a 26-year-old woman who visits him at Corcoran State Prison where he is serving a life sentence.

headline.main: California: Manson Takes Out Marriage License
headline.print_headline: California: Manson Takes Out Marriage License
